summary: Simple mod that adds knockdown/knockback to dragon's Fire/Frost Breath, Fire/Frost Ball, Wing attack, and Tail attack.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is super simple and meant for those of you who, like myself, wish dragons could be a little more 'impactful' while they are fighting and are unsatisfied with other dragon mods which have a similar effect.  It just adds knockdown / knockback effects to a dragon's Fire/Frost Breath, Fire/Frost Ball, Wing Bash, and Tail Bash attacks.  Also, light sources are added to the Fire/Frost Ball (for dramatic effect) and the Frost Breath light has been slightly changed.  Simple!  Will probably add knockdown to dragon landing (which is supposed to be in Deadly Dragons, but it has not worked once for me) and takeoff when I have the time.

Enjoy!



Is compatible with at least Deadly Dragons, though some new dragons may not have knockdown on their breath or projectiles... for now.
It is not compatible with Dragon Combat Overhaul.
author: ShiverTwitch

files.name: Dragonboost v1c
files.changelogHtml:
Reduced Fire breath knockback force
Increased knockback radius for Fire/Frost breath
Increased radius for Fire/Frost Ball knockback
